author: Staff Reporter
text:
Various Hindu organisations staged a demonstration in front of the Collectorate here on Wednesday in protest against denial of police permission to take out a procession on Tuesday to commemorate the birth centenary of Hindu Munnani founder Thanulingam.

Arasu Raja, State president of Hindu Munnani, said that Hindu organisations were denied permission for every programme. Every time they were forced to approach the court for permission, Mr. Raja said.
title: Denial of permission: Hindu organisations stage protest
